name: Killing loop
description:
Enter room, kill enemies, exit room, enter room, kill enemies, exit room, enter room ...

Controls:
Move with W, A, S, D or arrow keys.
Aim with mouse.
Fire with left mouse button.

Entry for Ludum Dare 47.

Developed using Godot.

Font:
VT323
Peter Hull
https://fonts.google.com/specimen/VT323?category=Monospace
